original_title: Steelers the Story of Six Championships
overview: Relive the excitement of the Steelers' championship seasons with this Pittsburgh Steelers The Story of 6 Championships 6-disc DVD set. The set features exclusive interviews with Steelers greats such as Andy Russell, Franco Harris, "Mean" Joe Greene, Jack Lambert, Mel Blount, Jerome Bettis, and many others.
title: Steelers the Story of Six Championships
